name: Tower Deck Furenzy
description:
This game is the ultimate mix of tower defense and card game.

Tower Deck Furenzy is a game which has been developed by three coders, two artists and two audio engineers.

In this game you need to use your cards to place towers (animals), upgrade them, and fight against the bad animals (like a tiger) :P

Thank you so much for playing our game!

We hope you give us a good rating!

Also, if you rate our game probably we rate yours!
